NITFPROT ( void   ) 

Destructor for the nitf_ImageIO object.

Destructor for the nitf_BlockingInfo object.

Print the contents of this Field

Parameters:
field The field object
nitf_BlockingInfo_print - Print blocking information

nitf_ImageIO_setReadCaching - Enable cached reads

nitf_ImageIO_destruct deallocates the memory associated with the object. The argument is set to NULL on return

Parameters:
Pointer to the nitf_ImageIO object to destroy
Returns:
None
See the documentation for nitf_ImageWriter_setReadCaching

Returns:
None
< Object to modify

nitf_BlockingInfo_print doe a formatted print of a nitf_BlockingInfo structure.

If the "file" argument is NULL stdout is used.

Returns:
None
Turn the geographic value into a string. You must have a buffer with 7 elements to hand in to this function, otherwise you will have memory corruption.

Turn the decimal value into a string +-dd.ddd. You must have a buffer with 7 elements to hand in to this function, otherwise you will have memory corruption.

Turn the decimal value into a string +-ddd.ddd. You must have a buffer with 7 elements to hand in to this function, otherwise you will have memory corruption.
